00006 #ifndef IS_XXX_DWA2003224_HPP
00007 # define IS_XXX_DWA2003224_HPP
00008 
00009 # include <boost/config.hpp>
00010 # include <boost/mpl/bool.hpp>
00011 # include <boost/preprocessor/enum_params.hpp>
00012 
00013 # if defined(BOOST_NO_TEMPLATE_PARTIAL_SPECIALIZATION)
00014 # include <boost/type_traits/is_reference.hpp>
00015 # include <boost/type_traits/add_reference.hpp>
00016 
00017 #  define BOOST_PYTHON_IS_XXX_DEF(name, qualified_name, nargs)          \
00018 template <class X_>                                                     \
00019 struct is_##name                                                        \
00020 {                                                                       \
00021     typedef char yes;                                                   \
00022     typedef char (&no)[2];                                              \
00023                                                                         \
00024     static typename add_reference<X_>::type dummy;                      \
00025                                                                         \
00026     struct helpers                                                      \
00027     {                                                                   \
00028         template < BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS_Z(1, nargs, class U) >          \
00029         static yes test(                                                \
00030            qualified_name< BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS_Z(1, nargs, U) >&, int  \
00031         );                                                              \
00032                                                                         \
00033         template <class U>                                              \
00034         static no test(U&, ...);                                        \
00035     };                                                                  \
00036                                                                         \
00037     BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(                                              \
00038         bool, value                                                     \
00039         = !is_reference<X_>::value                                      \
00040         & (sizeof(helpers::test(dummy, 0)) == sizeof(yes)));            \
00041                                                                         \
00042     typedef mpl::bool_<value> type;                                     \
00043 };
00044 
00045 # else
00046 
00047 #  define BOOST_PYTHON_IS_XXX_DEF(name, qualified_name, nargs)  \
00048 template <class T>                                              \
00049 struct is_##name : mpl::false_                                  \
00050 {                                                               \
00051 };                                                              \
00052                                                                 \
00053 template < BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS_Z(1, nargs, class T) >          \
00054 struct is_##name<                                               \
00055    qualified_name< BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS_Z(1, nargs, T) >        \
00056 >                                                               \
00057    : mpl::true_                                                 \
00058 {                                                               \
00059 };
00060 
00061 # endif
00062 
00063 #endif // IS_XXX_DWA2003224_HPP
